ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents competitior product names from being entered into ideas.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ARTIX ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ARTIX ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'AUTOMATION ANYWHERE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'AUTOMATION ANYWHERE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'FUSE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'FUSE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'INFORMATICA POWER CENTER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'INFORMATICA POWER CENTER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'JBOSS ENTERPRISE SOA PLATFORM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'JBOSS ENTERPRISE SOA PLATFORM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'MULE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'MULE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'OPENADAPTOR'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'OPENADAPTOR'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'OPENESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'OPENESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'OPENLINK VIRTUOSO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'OPENLINK VIRTUOSO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ORACLE BPEL PROCESS MANAGER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ORACLE BPEL PROCESS MANAGER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ORACLE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ORACLE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'PETALS ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'PETALS ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SONIC ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SONIC ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SAP NETWEAVER PROCESS INTEGRATION'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SAP NETWEAVER PROCESS INTEGRATION'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SERVICEMIX'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SERVICEMIX'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SPAGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SPAGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SUN JAVA COMPOSITE APPLICATION PLATFORM SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SUN JAVA COMPOSITE APPLICATION PLATFORM SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TALEND ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TALEND ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TRACKERSUITE.NET'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TRACKERSUITE.NET'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'UNIFY NXJ'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'UNIFY NXJ'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WEBSPHERE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WEBSPHERE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WEBSPHERE MESSAGE BROKER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WEBSPHERE MESSAGE BROKER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WEBSPHERE PROCESS SERVER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WEBSPHERE PROCESS SERVER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WS02 ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WS02 ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your idea contains a word or words that is not accepted. If you think you see this message mistakenly, please, contact support@intapp.com with your comment so we can improve our filters. (2)
